data.title: Raúl García Latorre
data.meta_description: Artist and sculpture in 3d and traditional. Sale of our own production of figures.
data.text:
I am currently living in the south of Spain, working as freelance traditional/digital sculptor.

​

I started my profesional career in 90's when I was very young, as I loved to paint my models, I soon found myself creating and sculpting my own figures. I developed myself as traditional sculptor for almost 20 years now, working for most of the companies in the miniature figure industry.

I recently moved to digital sculpting in 2015, as I realized digital is already a new standard in most of the industries. I am actually working in the collectibles statues industry. But I am really open to new fields.

​

I really don't like to look back my past, I am a more a "looking forward" artist focus on improving and doing new things.

Along I was lucky to found my own miniatures companies, Latorre Models, Enigma Miniatures and lately Mproyec, where I did what I really desired to do in that time.

​

This is truly a new period, I am very excited to see what the future come up with.
